## Lessons Learned
- ALWAYS work in sandbox first, never push to production without user approval
- Orchestrator must DELEGATE to agents, never code directly
- Never use hard limit() on queries that may return more results. Use pagination or remove limit for admin/internal queries.

## Rules
When encountering situations related to "never":
- ALWAYS work in sandbox first, never push to production without user approval
- Orchestrator must DELEGATE to agents, never code directly
- Never use hard limit() on queries that may return more results. Use pagination or remove limit for admin/internal queries.
